Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete symptom page system with 10 symptom guides

New Symptom System:
- Created symptoms.ts data config with 10 complete symptom guides
- Built dynamic SymptomPage component using slug-based routing
- Added /symptoms/:slug route to App.tsx

10 Symptom Pages Include:
1. Sharp Left Side Stomach Pain
2. Constant Head Pressure (No Pain)
3. Tired All The Time
4. Chest Burning After Eating
5. Morning Stiff Joints
6. Lower Back Pain On And Off
7. Bloating After Every Meal
8. Throat Tightness / Lump Feeling
9. Shortness of Breath After Eating
10. Dizzy When Standing Up

Each Symptom Guide Features:
- SEO-optimized title and hero tagline
- Overview and "what it might mean" context
- Common causes doctors look for
- Red flag warnings with emergency guidance
- Natural relief options (4+ products each with Amazon queries)
- Medical evaluation approaches
- Cross-links to related health guides
- CTA to comparison tool

Technical Implementation:
- Uses existing AmazonLink component with GA4 tracking
- Matches site gradient design and responsive patterns
- Clean 404 handling for invalid symptom slugs
- Amazon affiliate tracking via guideSlug="symptom-{slug}"
- Alert icons (AlertTriangle, Leaf, Stethoscope) for visual hierarchy

Amazon Monetization:
- 40+ additional Amazon affiliate product links
- All queries optimized for search intent
- Uses remedyclear-20 tag for commission tracking

This creates a scalable symptom library to capture long-tail search traffic and guide users to the main comparison tool.
